{{disambig-two|the son of Helm|guard of [[Meduseld]]|[[Háma]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Rohirrim|Rohir]] | name=Háma | image=Lída Holubová - The House of Eorl - Children of Helm Hammerhand.jpg | caption="The House of Eorl - Children of Helm Hammerhand" by [[Lída Holubová]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Rohan]] | affiliation= | language=[[Rohanese]] and [[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|2759}} | deathlocation=Near the [[Hornburg]] | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Eorl]] | parentage=[[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] | siblings=[[Haleth (son of Helm)|Haleth]] and [[Helm's daughter|unnamed sister]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Háma''' was the second son of [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]]. ==History== When the [[Dunlendings]] invaded [[Rohan]] in {{TA|2758}}, Háma took refuge in [[Helm's Deep]] with his father. During the [[Long Winter]] Helm was besieged, the Rohirrim's food ran low, and the people began to starve. After [[Yule]], Háma led a group out of the fortress on a sortie to find food, but they got lost in a snow storm and never returned.{{App|Eorl}} ==Etymology== Háma in [[Old English]] means "of home". ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | | | GRA | | |GRA=[[Gram]]
